page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: We interviewed a farmer who manages Worting Wood Farm,which is part of Many Down Company.He grows barley potatoes wheat,tomatoes and beans.He has over 300 animals which includes donkeys,chickens and goats.The females are crossbreeds which are Herefords and Friesians.There are two breeds of bull which are Charolais and Limousins.His cattle are not named instead they identified with freeze brand numbers.The calves have ear tags.When harvesting comes the winter barley comes first(middle to end of July).There are 16 full time people who work on the farm which includes two in the workshop,and two involved with stock and maintenance. If they have got too much straw and it is unwanted they burn it carefully.
